game.name: RageByte
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A minimalist precision platformer designed to lie to you. Dodge spikes, survive portal shifts, and trust nothing.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A minimalist precision platformer designed to lie to you. Dodge spikes, survive portal shifts, and trust nothing.
